---@class BattleLogicSystemContext:SimpleClassUtil
local BattleLogicSystemContext = SimpleClassUtil:class()

function BattleLogicSystemContext:initialize()

end

function BattleLogicSystemContext:init(list_camp)
    for camp, entityList in pairs(list_camp) do
        for pos, entity in pairs(entityList) do
            self:addEntity(entity)
        end
    end
end

function BattleLogicSystemContext:addEntity(entity)
    --if  self._animatorSystem then

    --if  self._debugSystem then
    --    self._debugSystem:addEntity(entity)
    --end
    --if  self._rotationSystem then
    --    self._rotationSystem:addEntity(entity)
    --end
end


function BattleLogicSystemContext:update(dt)

end


return BattleLogicSystemContext
